content.text:
# Endorsements in the 1928 Democratic Party presidential primaries

This is a list of endorsements for declared candidates in the Democratic primaries for the 1928 United States presidential election.
Alfred Smith
* John H. Caldwell, frmr. Assistant U.S. Assistant Attorney General
* Albert Burleson, U.S. Postmaster General (1913–1921)
* Thomas Watt Gregory, U.S. Attorney General (1914–1919)
; U.S. Senators
;:Current
* James Phelan, U.S. Senator from California (1915-1921)
* Thomas Bayard Jr., U.S. Senator from Delaware (1922-1929)
* Daniel Steck, U.S. Senator from Iowa (1926-1931)
* David Walsh, U.S. Senator from Massachusetts (1926-1947)
* William Bruce, U.S. Senator from Maryland (1923-1929)
* Edward Edwards, U.S. Senator from New Jersey (1923-1929)
* Royal Copeland, U.S. Senator from New York (1923-1938)
* Robert Wagner, U.S. Senator from New York (1927-1949)
* Edward Edwards, U.S. Senator from New Jersey (1923-1929)
* Peter Gerry, U.S. Senator from Rhode Island (1917-1929)
;:Former
* Oscar Underwood, U.S. Senator from Alabama (1915-1927)
* Johnson Camden Jr., U.S. Senator from Kentucky (1914-1915)
